column1: learned that the deceased had passed away.
උ :  ්දේනො රණ්ඩු  වුණො. ත්‍රීවිලර් රථ රියදුු ්ෙේල අතිේ අේලෝගන නැගිට්ටො  නැගිටලො ්ේරේන හැදු්ව්ර. ඊට
උ  : එයො එතන  හිටියො. ඉදලො එයො කු්ඩත්  අර්ගන  ගියො.
The main objection taken by the defense was that the witness PW2’s evidence
could not be believed as there are a number of contradictions and discrepancies. For
that, the counsel for the Accused has mentioned the following contradictions.
